name: 高淩菁
objective:
As a mater-level course in marketing research, this course is designed to
‧　　provide a understanding of research methodology and its implementation in marketing
‧　　understand the role, scope, and process of marketing research, and
‧　　enable the student to do real marketing research.
This course emphasizes an applied approach with practical applications of marketing research in management.
schedule:
Week 1  Course Overview
Week 2  Ch1. Introduction to Marketing & Marketing Research 
Week 3  Ch 2. Defining the Marketing Research Problem and Developing an Approach
             Ch 3 Research Design 
Week 4  Ch 4 & 5 Exploratory Research 
             Ch 6 Descriptive Research Design
Week 5  Ch 7 Causal Research Design 
Week 6  Class Recess 
Week 7  HBS Case- TruEarth Healthy Foods 
Week 8  Ch 8 & 9 Measurement & Scaling
              Ch 10 Questionnaire Design
Week 9  Ch 11 & 12 Sampling & Sample Size Determination
             Ch 13-15 Statistics Review
Week 10 Exam 
Week 11 Presentation of final project idea　　
Week 12 Ch16 Analysis of Variance and Covariance
              Ch17 Correlation and Regression
Week 13 Ch18 Discriminat and Logit Analysis
Week 14 Ch19 Factor Analysis
              Ch 20 Cluster Analysis
Week 15 HBS Case- Harvard Graduate Students Housing Survey
Week 16 Final project Q&A
Week 17 Course Project Presentation (1)
Week 18 Course Project Presentation (2)
scorePolicy:
Exam (Individual)                      20%
HBS Case Analysis (Group)      40%
Final Project (Individual)            40 %
materials:
Naresh K. Malhotra, Marketing Research, Prentice Hall, 2010.
HBS Case: TruEarth Healthy Foods
